questionTitle: East Liverpool, Ohio, ___the pottery capital of the United States.
The orchestra are meant to ___ time with the conductor.
The parcel eventually arrived six weeks later, and not ___ time!
As resident of New Mexico, Dennis Chavez ___ to the House of Representatives in 1930 and to the Senate in1938.
________ of the United States grown during a Republican administration.
The man gave ________ a diamond necklace.
Flight nineteen from New York and Washington is now arriving at ________.
Fast-food restaurants have become popular because many working people want ________
________ two waves pass a given point simultaneously, they will have no effect on each other's subsequent motion.
Unless protected areas are established, the Bengal tiger, the blue whale, and the California condor face ________ of extinction.
The student was told that he could hand in the lost wallet to ________.
Generic medications are just as ________, and much less expensive.
A telephone recording tells callers ________.
anwers: what time does the movie start

questionTitle: Not every pearl that is found ________.
In an internal combustion engine, ________ and air are heated inside a cylinder.
Jupiter ________ the largest planet in the Solar System.
A child in the first grade tends to be ________ all of the other children in his class.
I know ________ a different way to get there but I like this one.
Although solar energy is cheaper than oil, ________ have advantages as well as disadvantages.
_______, he would have signed his name in the corner.
anwers: If he had painted that picture
If he would have painted that picture
